title: What songs have you made a cover of? - Quora

response.answer_text: TL;DR everything from blues to metal Oh tonnes. During this lockdown, my bandmate and I have been playing songs at each other via the internet. It's been a laugh. They're all here: The Permanent Residents Covid Song Wars - YouTube On top of that, our second record is exclusively 90 hip hop covers, all done acoustically. Albedo (Eclectic Adventures in 90s Hip Hop) - YouTube You can find Albedo on Spotify and what have you if you like it.
